title: Sketches of travel:
author: King, Horatio
snippet: The Riding Park and open promenade lies west of the city, extending back on the banks of the Arno about two miles. One of the six or seven bridges over the Arno at Florence crosses from this Park,

title: Sketches of Travel; or, Twelve Months in Europe
author: King, Horatio
snippet: Mr. McNamee has just completed a beau-tiful bust in marble of Miss Kinsley, of Brooklyn. The Riding Park and open promenade lies west ofthe city, extending back on the banks of the Arnoabout two miles. One of the six or seven bridgesover the Arno at Florence crosses from this Park
